verses.name: Joshua 7:21
verses.text: When I saw among the spoils a goodly Babylonish garment, and two hundred shekels of silver, and a wedge of gold of fifty shekels weight, then I coveted them, and took them; and, behold, they are hid in the earth in the midst of my tent, and the silver under it.

verses.name: Joshua 7:22
verses.text: So Joshua sent messengers, and they ran unto the tent; and, behold, it was hid in his tent, and the silver under it.
